ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Cook pasta until just tender to avoid mushiness when combined with sauce
Heat the soup mixture gently over medium heat to prevent scorching
Stir cheese in off heat for a smoother, creamier sauce
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Should I cook the pasta separately from the sauce, and how do I get a smooth, creamy texture?
